TEXT.TITLE: ARITECH CORP <ARIT.O> 3RD QTR OCT TWO
TEXT.BODY: Shr 34 cts vs 33 cts Net 1,031,000 vs 972,000 Revs 27.9 mln vs 26.9 mln Nine mths Shr 93 cts vs 76 cts Net 2,802,000 vs 2,267,000 Revs 86.1 mln vs 77.7 mln NOTE: 1987 3rd qtr and nine mths revs includes sales to ADT Inc of 3.0 mln dlrs and 10.9 mln dlrs. 1986 3rd qtr and nine mths includes sales of 3.5 mln dlrs and 10.7 mln dlrs.
